post.title: is it possible to set up color temp without buying additional equipment?
post.content: i just calibrated my new marantz vp-8600 dlp front projector. it has 4 color temp settings 1. warm; 2. normal; 3. cool; and 4. white. the default factory setting is 2. normal. i have both dve and avia. is there a way to properly set this up without buying more equipment.
